title: Ad serenissimam Elizabetham Angliae Reginam Theodor. Beza
author: Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
notes: Another issue of "Ad serenissimam Elizabetham angliae reginam Theodor. Beza", with an elegiac distich initialed "I.M." added before the imprint.
Verses in eight languages on the defeat of the Spanish Armada.--STC.
Imperfect; creased and folded with some loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
